page.title: 05HOUSING. INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: As with many rural areas most of the housing pre-dates the 20th Centuary, but has been much altered and modern- ised.There are some newer houses main- ly in Sydenham Damerel but the green belt policy restricts building as the land is agricultural and so there is some conversion of old buildings such as barns into dwellings.Some dwellings still retain their own water supply but most have their own sewage dispos- al system. Nearly all houses have in- door toilets, bathrooms and hot and cold water supply but a few remain without.These tend to modernised upon change of ownership.There is more home ownership than tenancy and no council owned homes. Information- village and Post Office notice boards in Sydenham. Mobile library calls weekly.
